html.p: This dashboard helps determine a user's experience within a Citrix session. Enter a user name below and press the Search button to select a user session to inspect.

search.query: `xd_index` sourcetype=xendesktop:*:session UserName="$username$" StartTime!="" SiteName="*" | makemv delim=";" ApplicationsInUse | stats latest(_time) AS CurrentTime Values(ApplicationsInUse) AS "Application(s)" by StartTime MachineName UserName SiteName | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S %Z" mktime(StartTime) | eval SessionDuration = tostring(CurrentTime - StartTime, "duration") | eval "Log on Time" = strftime(StartTime, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") | table UserName "Log on Time" SiteName "Application(s)" MachineName SessionDuration StartTime CurrentTime | rename UserName AS "User Name" SiteName AS "Site Name" MachineName AS "Machine Name" SessionDuration AS "Session Duration"
